Weather: Auckland Anniversary Weekend to see showers across country, thunder possible on Sunday https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-auckland-anniversary-weekend-to-see-showers-across-country-thunder-possible-on-sunday/QLCET2ILSZA5TM3YAY5TMOXL5E/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-auckland-anniversary-weekend-to-see-showers-across-country-thunder-possible-on-sunday/QLCET2ILSZA5TM3YAY5TMOXL5E/ Raphael FranksRain should start in upper North Island later Saturday evening, then set in for weekend. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 16:00:00 +0000 A front was tipped to push rain up the country on Saturday, seeing MetService issue a tranche of heavy rain warnings in the South Island and a forecast for showers in the North Island from the afternoon. Photo / Sarah Ivey

Fri, 26 Jan 2024 16:00:00 +0000 The woman bought the car thinking it had only done 50,000km but later found it had more than 184,000 on the clock.
